INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_FUND_TP_RELTN (FUND_TP_RELTN_CDE, FUND_TP_RELTN_DSCR, FUND_TP_RELTN_PRI, IS_INACT, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ) VALUES (#{item.fundTpReltnCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fundTpReltnDscr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fundTpReltnPri,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isInact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
